section.title: Operations Bridge Integration
section.para: This documentation demonstrates the possible integration between the &kw-hos-phrase; monitoring solution and Operations Bridge.

&kw-hos; Monasca can easily be integrated with your existing monitoring tools. This page describes how to integrate &productname; Monasca with Operations Bridge so that your OpenStack cloud can be monitored and managed by Ops Bridge.
The Operations Bridge Connector for &productname; Monasca integrates events and topology information from &productname; Monasca with the Operations Bridge solution.
The integration provides the following functionality:

listitem.para: Forwarding of &productname; Monasca alerts and topology to Operations Bridge for event correlation
Customization of forwarded events and topology
